attributes.action: Assure that the Banbury Horton General Hospital stays open as Oxford is too far!
attributes.additional_details: See NHS statistics and the resuscitation councils standards for early access in cardiac arrest and cardiac event cases and or cva's/stroke victims time every single second counts
attributes.background: In writing this as a ambulance practitioner I am solely concerned with patients care as for a seriously ill patient or one in cardiac arrest yo be conveyed from Banbury and surrounding area all the way to Oxford would assuredly kill them we must protect Horton Hospital as a local Banbury resource!!!
